item.title: nDreams announces VR action adventure game Reach for PS VR2, SteamVR, and Quest
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/ndreams-announces-vr-action-adventure-game-reach-for-ps-vr2-steamvr-and-quest

nDreams has announced Reach, a virtual reality action adventure game coming to PlayStation VR2, SteamVR, and Quest in 2025.

“We set out to create an action adventure where players feel present, powerful, and fully in control of every action,” said nDreams Elevation head of studio Glenn Brace in a press release. “Our studio ethos has always been to push VR gameplay forward through rich physical engagement and player performance roleplay, and Reach is the sum of those efforts. We can’t wait for players to experience it for themselves.”

Former Sony Interactive Entertainment head of indies initiative Shuhei Yoshida also commented, “I’m thrilled to help introduce Reach to the world. I’ve been a fan of nDreams’ work for many years, and after playing the game myself, I was blown away by the level of immersion, freedom, and creativity they’ve achieved. This debut title from the Elevation studio is a pioneering step forward for [virtual reality], and I can’t wait for players to experience it firsthand.”

Here is an overview of the game, via nDreams:

About

The ground-breaking cinematic action-adventure from nDreams Elevation—the virtual reality immersion expert’s pioneering new studio.

Embody a reluctant hero, wield extraordinary abilities, and journey into a perilous world of crossed realities. Make every move matter to shape your destiny. Are you ready to make the leap?

Key Features

  • Unrivalled Immersion – Full-body awareness and true-to-life interactions deliver unmatched presence in every moment.
  • Live the Adventure – Delve deep into a spectacular world packed with mythical threats, and secrets to uncover.
  • Own the Action – Freely jump, climb, and zip-line across breathtaking environments with smooth, intuitive traversal designed for virtual reality.
  • Fight With Fluidity – Engage in thrilling and emergent combat encounters against imposing, deadly adversaries.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

item.title: Co-op sci-fi survival game Blind Descent announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/co-op-sci-fi-survival-game-blind-descent-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out in Early Access for PC in 2026.

META Publishing and developer Pokuch have announced Blind Descent, a cooperative science-fiction survival game coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG. It will launch first in Early Access for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via META Publishing:

About

A survival and exploration mission deep beneath the Martian surface. A team of up to four pioneers has been sent to uncover the fate of a missing crew within a vast, uncharted underground world. What was supposed to be a routine expedition has become a fight for human survival. As exploration begins, the subterranean world reveals itself as a living, reactive ecosystem. It is no longer just a mission, it’s a transformation, a challenge to integrate and thrive in a world where survival hinges on your ability to learn, adapt, and symbiotize.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • You’re the Outsider in a Mesmerizing and Deadly World – Unravel the fate of the missing pioneer team as you delve into the Martian depths. With the help of your AI assistant, explore a living ecosystem filled with mysteries. It’s not your typical adventure story, this world challenges you to grow into it, adapt, and ultimately understand its intricate balance. Every step you take reveals more alien secrets, pulling you deeper into a symbiotic existence.
  • Use Versatile Crafting to Survive – Research the lifeforms around you to gather resources and craft essential tools. Observing how alien creatures interact with their environment can lead to powerful insights. Every crafted item connects you further to the alien world, transforming survival into a path to integration.
  • Build a Reliable Shelter – Construct shelters and custom bases log by log to protect yourself from Martian hazards and lifeforms. Vines, fungal growths, and creeping alien organisms react to neglect, overtaking poorly maintained shelters. Building here isn’t just construction; it’s about coexisting with an ecosystem that has its own will.
  • Traverse Dangerous Terrain With Advanced Climbing Tools – Scale cliffs and navigate the perilous landscape using dynamic climbing gear to explore deeper underground. The alien world offers unique traversal challenges, and adaptation to these obstacles is key to survival.
  • Adapt to Alien and Unusual Environmental Hazards and Biomes – Face ever-changing threats like underground storms, toxic gases, and aggressive creatures. Success depends on observing and learning. Sometimes symbiosis means turning these hazards into survival strategies.
  • Utilize Mutation-Enhanced Abilities – Gain powerful mutations to enhance your genetics as well as combat, and exploration skills. Early field data indicates that consuming specific alien fruits or spores unlocks biological adaptations, allowing pioneers to explore deeper and survive harsher conditions.
  • Survive as a Team – Collaborate with up to three pioneers to gather resources, build shelters, and explore the underground world together. Symbiosis extends to teamwork—your survival depends on the collective adaptation and shared insights of your crew.

The discovery of this Martian underground world presents both an unprecedented opportunity for exploration and a significant challenge. The successful completion of this mission will not only uncover the fate of the pioneer team but also pave the way for future expeditions into this hidden Martian realm. Symbiosis may hold the key to survival.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View a set of screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Holstin ‘Jeziorne-Kolonia’ demo for PC now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/holstin-jeziorne-kolonia-demo-for-pc-now-available

  • PC

Play the opening two hours.

A new demo for psychological survival horror game Holstin is now available for PC via Steam, develeoper Sonka announced.

Here is an overview of the demo, via Sonka:

While the two previous public demos showcased specific slices or mechanics, the new demo offers players a very meaty first look at the game’s entire eerie 90s Eastern Euro-fueled experience. It begins with the opening segment of Holstin‘s story, explaining what drew you into the decaying and possessed Polish lakeside town of Jeziorne-Kolonia. Get hands-on with the core gameplay, from engaging in intense combat and solving environmental puzzles to scavenging for survival, exploring ooze-infested streets and interiors, and interacting with the not-so-mentally-stable locals who still haven’t fully Turned. The demo also highlights Holstin‘s unique camera and lighting system, which seamlessly shifts between multiple perspectives in real-time lit, fully 3D pixel environments.

Holstin will be available for PlayStation, Xbox, Switch, and PC (Steam) platforms. A release date has yet to be announced.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Call of the Sea sequel Call of the Elder Gods announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/call-of-the-sea-sequel-call-of-the-elder-gods-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-switch-2-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Journey to the far corners of the Earth and unearth ancient horrors.

Publisher Kwalee and developer Out of the Blue Games have announced Call of the Elder Gods, a sequel to puzzle adventure game Call of the Sea. It will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store. A release date was not announced.

“We’ve been fortunate to work with Kwalee—they’re fans of our games and share our passion for crafting high-quality experiences with care and dedication,” said Out of the Blue co-founder and creative director Tatiana Delgado in a press release. “We couldn’t ask for a better partner on this journey.”

Kwalee vice president of PC and console Benjamin Forrester added, “We’re really excited to be teaming up with Out of the Blue on Call of the Elder Gods. They’ve already shown what they’re capable of with Call of the Sea and American Arcadia. Their talent for storytelling and clever puzzle design is something we truly admire and we think players are going to love what’s coming next.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via Kwalee:

About

Dear Prof. Everhart,

It brings me no joy to write you again but I’m afraid I have nowhere else to turn. I recognize the artifact in your possession. I have dreamed about it every night for months. I have seen impossible, unexplainable things, but if the artifact is real then I fear they may be too. I must meet with you at once. I am running out of options.

Yours,
Evangeline Drayton

All is not well at Miskatonic University. Professor Harry Everhart tries to ignore the shadows flitting at the corners of his vision, while student Evangeline Drayton is haunted with impossible dreams of an artifact uncovered a decade ago. In their search for answers, the pair will uncover revelations more ancient than anyone could have imagined.

Journey to the far corners of the Earth and unearth ancient horrors in this Lovecraftian narrative puzzle adventure and sequel to 2020’s critically acclaimed Call of the Sea.

Key Features

  • Shocking Secrets – Call of the Sea’s object and observation-based puzzles return with new depth. Scour richly-rendered environments for clues. Swap between Harry and Evangeline to solve complex, multi-part problems across time and space. Choose your own difficulty level with toggle-able hints, icons, and journal entries. For a true challenge, dare to read the Occult Books scattered about the world and meet new, reality-warping enigmas.
  • Dizzying Marvels – Harry and Evangeline’s journey takes them from the firelit libraries of a New England mansion to the red sands of the Australian outback, through frozen wastelands and otherworldly cities out of time, all stunningly rendered in Unreal Engine 5 and featuring a soundtrack by multi-award-winning returning composer Eduardo De La Iglesia.
  • A Shadow Out of Time – Follow Harry Everhart and Evangeline Drayton as they search for the truth about their missing loved ones and come face-to-face with beings beyond their understanding. Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft’s The Shadow out of Time, Call of the Elder Gods features a fully voice-acted story of grief, family, and sanity, starring returning talents Yuri Lowenthal (Marvel’s Spider-Man, Arcane, Final Fantasy VII Rebirth) and Cissy Jones (Firewatch, Starfield, Baldur’s Gate III).

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Crisol: Theater of Idols launches in 2025 for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/crisol-theater-of-idols-launches-in-2025-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

Publisher Blumhouse Games and developer Vermila will release first-person horror action adventure game Crisol: Theater of Idols for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam in 2025, the companies announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Blumhouse Games:

About

Crisol: Theater of Idols is a gripping first-person horror / action adventure set in the haunting world of Hispania, a nightmarish reimagining of Spain.

Playing as Gabriel, a soldier who can use his own blood as a deadly weapon, you endeavor on a journey to uncover the mysterious disappearance of the Sun God.

Key Features

  • Explore the Cursed Island of Tormentosa – Uncover the chilling history and twisted folklore of Tormentosa, a beautiful but malevolent island. Traverse eerie landscapes, crumbling grand ruins, and labyrinthine streets as you peel back the layers of cults and blood sacrifice.
  • Blood is Your Weapon—and Your Curse – Blood is both your lifeline and your ammunition. Wield this new-found power against terrifying enemies and solve intricate puzzles, but beware: every shot drains your life. Choose wisely—survival hinges on your ability to balance life and death.
  • Manage Your Powers and Weapons – Upgrading the powers that leverage the lethality of blood allows you to deal more damage, fight for longer, and gain bonuses in combat. Navigate myriad weapon options for the right scenario and improve them through coins found in your exploration of Tormentosa.
  • A Story Rooted in Horror and History – Hispania’s disturbing fusion of historical events, folklore, and religious undertones creates a uniquely horrifying world. Face off against staggering statues brought to life and unravel a dark narrative that blurs the line between reality and nightmare.

Prepare to sacrifice everything. How much blood will you shed to uncover the truth?

Watch the reveal trailer below.

Reveal Trailer

item.title: ANTRO launches June 27
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/antro-launches-june-27

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

2.5D rhythm action platformer dated.

2.5D rhythm action puzzle platformer ANTRO will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on June 27, publisher Selecta Play and developer Gatera Studio announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Selecta Play:

About

After a catastrophic collapse forces humanity underground, the city of ANTRO rises beneath the ruins of Barcelona. Life is brutal—those living deep below work under harsh conditions, while the ruling class above exerts total control through a regime known as La Cupula. Music and art are forbidden, and expression is silenced—until a resistance begins to rise. In ANTRO, you’ll journey through a city in turmoil, using rhythm to guide your movement, outsmart threats, and uncover the truth behind the package that could change everything. Play to the rhythm of revolution—and don’t stop moving.

Key Features

  • Music-Driven Gameplay – Every movement, puzzle, and chase is perfectly synchronized to the rhythm of hip-hop, drill, R&B, and electronic beats.
  • Underground Metropolis – Explore ANTRO, a divided underground city beneath the ruins of Barcelona, where the elite rule while the lower class is forced into hard labor.
  • Rhythmic Platforming and Parkour – Overcome obstacles, solve puzzles, and run for your life in fast-paced, music-driven sequences.
  • A Revolution in the Making – Join Los Discordantes, the underground rebellion fighting against the tech-dominated dictatorship of La Cúpula.
  • Exclusive Physical Edition Booklet – Available only in the PlayStation 5 physical release, this collector’s booklet offers an inside look at the world, characters, and artistic vision of ANTRO.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Open-world survival crafting game Guardians of the Wild Sky announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/open-world-survival-crafting-game-guardians-of-the-wild-sky-announced-for-pc

Blue Isle Studios has announced open-world survival crafting game Guardians of the Wild Sky for PC (Steam). It will launch this summer.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Fall into the world of Guardians of the Wild Sky, a survival-crafting adventure where magical creatures called Guardians are your greatest allies. Sail through the skies on your trusty airship and explore a massive world; discover unique floating biomes teeming with life, hidden treasures, and dangerous beasts to conquer.

Explore solo or play cooperatively with friends as you build everything from cozy cottages to elaborate homesteads, or even floating castles that can fly!

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • Guardians: Your Magical Companions
    • At the heart of your journey are the Guardians – extraordinary creatures brimming with elemental magic and unique personalities. Your Guardians are more than companions; they’re your partners in shaping the skies.
    • Capture and bond with Guardians, each with unique abilities and traits that can aid you in combat, exploration, survival and crafting
    • Build strong relationships by feeding, grooming and caring for your Guardians. Watch them grow into loyal companions that can fight by your side or lend their work skills to your base or airship crew
    • Unlock a deep breeding system, combining traits and genetics to create powerful new Guardians tailored to your playstyle
  • Build, Craft, Create, and Sail
    • Bring your imagination to life as you shape your place in the skies. Whether you’re building for survival or style, the possibilities are endless.
    • Design your dream home in the skies; from cozy cottages to flying castles. Or, build mighty airships to command the skies
    • A deep crafting system lets you craft hundreds of tools, weapons and magical items to survive and thrive
    • Master systems for cooking, farming and fishing (even in clouds!)
  • Face the Dangers of the Wild Sky
    • Brave the wild and embark on an epic adventure to uncover shadowy caves, ancient dungeons and treacherous foes called Cultists. Danger is lurking everywhere, if you seek it…
    • Explore hidden caves, uncover treasures and rare crafting materials to help you conquer the world
    • Challenge the Titan or Eternal beasts within ancient dungeons and crumbling battledromes. Those who survive will be rewarded with valuable loot and gear; build trophies to showcase your mastery of the great beasts
    • Confront the Cultist factions; battle against these shadowy foes and reclaim the lands and skies from their sinister plans
  • A Living, Breathing World
    • Explore a vast cloud sea spanning hundreds of kilometers as you uncover biomes made up of thousands of floating islands.
    • Experience a dynamic environment with day-night cycles, evolving weather patterns and shifting climates
    • The world is teeming with wildlife; discover everything from deadly Titans all the way down to the smallest critter or butterfly
    • Observe each new Guardian species to reveal unique personalities, traits and powerful abilities
    • Discover breathtaking landscapes scattered with ancient ruins and hidden secrets; unlock mysteries from the past
  • Adventure Alone or With Friends
    • The skies are vast, and your journey can be as solitary or social as you choose. Forge your path alone or team up for even greater adventures.
    • Play solo in offline mode to explore at your own pace, this is a great way to learn the game
    • Or, jump into cooperative multiplayer modes to explore, build and conquer together; tackling the skies as a team of adventurers
    • Multiplayer is recommended for up to 5 players, however, you can customize your server however you like, expanding the player limit and opening the world up to even more players

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Luto launches July 22

Psychological horror game dated.

Psychological horror game Luto will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on July 22, publisher Selecta Play and developer Broken Bird Games announced. A physical edition will launch for PlayStation 5 later in 2025.

Here is a brief overview of Luto, via Selecta Play:

Developed by Broken Bird Games, Luto is a first-person psychological horror narrative experience where players embody a person living in despair and unable to leave their house. Finding the way to leave will lead them through a series of paths challenging their senses and uncovering untold fears and phobias.

  • Explore the pain of losing a loved one, the horror of the insecurity to the darkness that lurks behind the anxiety and depression.
  • Enter a mysterious place full of secrets to discover and challenges to face. Deciphering it all will not be an easy task. Will you be able to tell fact from fiction?
  • Discover an environmental and sensory horror where you will experience the fear of numerous phobias.

item.title: Joe & Mac Retro Collection announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/joe-mac-retro-collection-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-switch-and-pc

Red Art Games has announced Joe & Mac Retro Collection, a collection including Joe & Mac: Caveman Ninja, Congo’s Caper, and Joe & Mac 2: Lost in the Tropics. It will launch digitally for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam in 2025. A Kickstarter campaign will launch on June 10.

Here is an overview of the collection, via Red Art Games:

About

Developed by Red Art Studios, Red Art Games’ internal development studio, the Joe & Mac Retro Collection is a compilation of Joe & Mac: Caveman Ninja, Congo’s Caper, and Joe & Mac 2: Lost in the Tropics, the three Joe & Mac titles developed by Data East and released for Super Nintendo Entertainment System between 1991 and 1995. All three games are part of the Tatakae Genshijin franchise in Japan.

  • Joe & Mac: Caveman Ninja – A run-and-gun platformer that follows the titular Joe and Mac as they fight through 12 hellish levels using prehistoric (but not just) tools and weapons. While the game was censored when it came out in the west, the Retro Collection also includes the original Japanese version!
  • Congo’s Caper – A side-scrolling action platformer centered around Congo, a half-human, half-monkey boy looking to rescue his girlfriend from a demon through 35 varied levels.
  • Joe & Mac 2: Lost in the Tropics – This title adds a light roleplaying aspect to the series. While the goal is still to defeat cavemen and dinosaurs, players can court and wed their Stone Age girlfriend, and even have a child with her!

In addition to allowing players to rediscover the original games as they were presented back in the 90s, the Joe & Mac Retro Collection also features numerous quality of life improvements!

Key Features

  • Three classic games from the 16-bit era.
  • Includes both the western and uncensored Japanese versions of each title.
  • Save states have been added to facilitate progress.
  • Made a mistake? Go back in time by using the Rewind feature.
  • Optional CRT filter for an even more retro experience.
  • Joe & Mac: Caveman Ninja and Joe & Mac 2: Lost in the Tropics can be played by two players in local cooperative mode.
  • Customizable aspect ratios.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer

item.title: ANIMALKIND closed alpha test set for July
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/animalkind-closed-alpha-test-set-for-july

  • PC

Playtest the cozy open-world sandbox game.

Uncommon Games will host a closed alpha playtest for cozy open-world sandbox game ANIMALKIND in July, the developer announced. Sign-ups are available now via the game’s Steam page.

Here is an overview of the game, via Uncommon Games:

About

ANIMALKIND takes place in an inviting open world populated by adorable animal friends, with access to the industrial-grade opposable thumbs and upgradeable chassis of an ancient mech. Discover enchanting wilderness biomes, build a bustling village, and customize your ideal home with this powerful relic. Beyond the game’s charming characters and cozy vibes lies a mysterious world. Explore to uncover hints of what transpired before your character joined the world of ANIMALKIND. Players can set out solo, or frolic with friends to create towns cooperatively, play minigames, and forage together in the wild.

Key Features

  • Play as an Adorable Animal – Play as an adorable corgi, tuxedo cat, or North American trash panda (common raccoon)—each with unique animations and customizations.
  • Pilot an Ancient Mech – Use the power of industrial-grade opposable thumbs and an upgradeable chassis to traverse the world of ANIMALKIND, gather resources, craft, and flex your design skills.
  • Establish a Thriving Town – Gather a community of friendly animals by building homes, laying out paths, and planting gardens.
  • Explore the Ever-Evolving Wilderness – Travel to dynamic wilderness areas with their own biomes, recruitable characters, and resources.
  • Cozy Cooperative Play With Your Friends – Play solo, or invite up to three friends to be a part of your game and play seamlessly with our hosted, private servers.

Watch a new trailer below.

Alpha 2 Announce Trailer

item.title: Hirogami demo for PC now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/hirogami-demo-for-pc-now-available

  • PC

Full game due out on for PlayStation 5 and PC on September 3.

A demo for action platformer Hirogami is now available for PC via Steam as part of Steam Next Fest: June 2025 Edition, which runs from June 9 to 16, publisher Kakehashi Games and developer Bandai Namco Studios Singapore announced.

Here is a brief overview of the game, via Kakehashi Games:

In Hirogami, players will assume the role of Hiro, a brave warrior defending their fragile world from digital invaders known as “the Blight.” Armed with the ancient art of folding,

Hiro harnesses the power of origami animal forms to crash, smash, leap, roll, and soar through platforming puzzles, defeat foes, and – with your help – save their tranquil homeland of Shishiki Village.

Roll through obstacles and enemies alike as a hardy Armadillo, traverse the treetops and pound pests as a mighty Ape, and leap to previously unreachable heights as a formidable Frog.

Hirogami is due out for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam on September 3.
